mapper.select: SELECT TT_GRADE, TT_CLASS FROM T_MEMBER WHERE TT_NO = #{ttNo}

SELECT A.FM_NUM, B.SS_NAME, B.SS_IMAGE, NVL((SELECT CD_URL FROM CAREER_DESIGN B WHERE A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO AND CD_VALUE='JA' AND A.FM_GRADE=B.CD_GRADE),'데이터없음') as JAURL, NVL((SELECT CD_URL FROM CAREER_DESIGN B WHERE A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO AND CD_VALUE='JI' AND A.FM_GRADE=B.CD_GRADE),'데이터없음') as JIURL, NVL((SELECT CD_URL FROM CAREER_DESIGN B WHERE A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO AND CD_VALUE='IH' AND A.FM_GRADE=B.CD_GRADE),'데이터없음') as IHURL, NVL((SELECT CD_URL FROM CAREER_DESIGN B WHERE A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO AND CD_VALUE='VA' AND A.FM_GRADE=B.CD_GRADE),'데이터없음') as VAURL, NVL((SELECT CD_URL FROM CAREER_DESIGN B WHERE A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO AND CD_VALUE='CM' AND A.FM_GRADE=B.CD_GRADE),'데이터없음') as CMURL FROM FM_MEMBER A, S_MEMBER B WHERE A.FM_GRADE = #{ttGrade} AND A.FM_CLASS = #{ttClass} AND A.SS_NO = B.SS_NO
UNION ALL
